content:
#  Make a donation -- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/university/make-a-donation
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:07:34

Skip to content ↓

 Make a donation 

AGH University of Krakow is a modern research university with a social mission. Our university is a place where we create knowledge and pass it on to the world. This is a place of unlimited possibilities. Support AGH University activities and make a monetary donation.

Support us with your donation
 With your donation, you can support the AGH University of Krakow and its statutory purposes – especially education, development of students and teachers, research, and innovation. Everyone can be a donor: AGH University alumni, companies, public institutions, foundations, government bodies, non-government organisations, and private individuals.

Donations can be made directly into our Bank Pekao account via the details below
 Akademia Górniczo-Hutnicza im. Stanisława Staszica w Krakowie
 al. Mickiewicza 30, 30-059 Kraków

Bank Name:
 Bank Pekao

Address: 
1 Pijarska, 31-015 Kraków

Account numbers:
 PL: 96 1240 4722 1111 0000 4858 2922
 EUR: PL49 1240 4722 1978 0000 4859 8327
 USD: PL15 1240 4722 1787 0000 4854 0977

Swift Code:
 PKOPPLPW

Transfer description:
 Monetary donation for statutory purposes of the AGH University

If you wish to make a donation for a particular purpose, please specify this in the transfer description (for example, monetary donation for statutory purposes of the AGH University for the Faculty of…/for the Department of…/for the Institute of…/for the purchase of…/for funding or endowing a specific activity/action/for a Student Research Club, etc.).
